Name: Luck be a Landlord
About the game: Your landlord is knocking on your door. You have one coin left to your name. You insert the coin into your slot machine...and...JACKPOT! Luck be a Landlord, tonight! Features Roguelite gameplay - The symbols you can add to the slot machine are different every time! Lots of Symbols to add to your slot machine - Each symbol has different effects and interactions. Plenty of Items to choose from - The items are different every time as well, leading to interesting build strategies. A terrible landlord to defeat. A dog you can pet. Capitalism.
